{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.460
    | text      = This is Justin from Sky Television News, national television in the United Kingdom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:23.700
    | text      = Report 130 soldiers killed in Iraq.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:26.940
    | text      = We're not hearing that here, are we?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.100
    | text      = A Pentagon source has set up 130 U.S. troops have been killed in fierce fighting in Iraq
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.940
    | text      = in the last day.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.700
    | text      = The large-scale battle, described as intense, has taken place in the town of R. Ramadi,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.820
    | text      = 20 miles west of Foljala.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:45.840
    | text      = So this is a real Sky News article that Alex is reporting on, but it ultimately turned
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:49.539
    | text      = out not to be correct.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:51.480
    | text      = Alex consistently pronounces Fallujah like that, but I don't want to be too much of a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:55.259
    | text      = dick about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.259
    | text      = I mispronounce things all the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:57.539
    | text      = Oh, I just want to be...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:58.539
    | text      = Yeah, I'm pointing it out for the sake of clarity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:59.860
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:00.860
    | text      = So this has to do with the battle that broke out in Ramadi on April 6th, and in the first
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:05.419
    | text      = day of fighting, 12 U.S. soldiers were killed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.299
    | text      = The thing is that even in the Sky News article, the reporter David Chatter is quoted as saying,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.419
    | text      = quote, none of this is official yet, none of this is confirmed, which should be a cause
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:17.019
    | text      = to take the numbers that are being cited with a grain of salt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:20.460
    | text      = Alex isn't into that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:21.460
    | text      = He takes the unconfirmed numbers as concrete and then accuses the other media outlets of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:25.320
    | text      = not covering the story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:27.259
    | text      = In reality, other U.S. mainstream media outlets covered this battle, and with a gift of hindsight,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.620
    | text      = they were much more accurate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.500
    | text      = CNN reported, quote, as many as a dozen U.S. Marines were killed Tuesday in heavy fighting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.899
    | text      = in the western Iraq town of Ramadi.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.980
    | text      = The Washington Post had an article about it, as did the New York Times and the Los Angeles
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:46.179
    | text      = Times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:47.179
    | text      = The Chicago Tribune covered the story, saying, quote, about a dozen U.S. Marines were killed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:50.779
    | text      = Tuesday as fighting across Iraq intensified.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.139
    | text      = They said about a dozen because, all told, the fatalities included these 12 Marines,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:58.059
    | text      = another U.S. soldier, and one coalition soldier from Ukraine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:01.700
    | text      = I was trying to figure out where this 130 number could have come from, and the best
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:05.779
    | text      = guess that I have is that it was a mistake on the part of the Sky News reporter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:09.539
    | text      = The Chicago Tribune article includes a figure that 130 Iraqis had died since fighting broke
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:14.580
    | text      = out that Sunday, which I have a suspicion is what is being confused by the Sky News
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:18.299
    | text      = article and then reported by Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:20.460
    | text      = I'm not sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.460
    | text      = That's just my best guess.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:22.740
    | text      = But whatever the case is for what happened, it appears that this unconfirmed figure was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:26.379
    | text      = inaccurate, but may actually reflect the death toll on the Iraqi side.

    | timestamp = 00:11:30.419
    | text      = Yeah.

    | timestamp = 00:11:31.419

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:11:32.419
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:33.419
    | text      = This highlights an important feature of Alex's news philosophy, though.

{{TranscriptBlock
